thread.title: BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Launches Commbank Perls X Capital Notes​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Commonwealth Bank Of Australia Launches Commbank Perls X Capital Notes​

organizations.name: brief-commonwealth bank of australia launches commbank perls

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Commonwealth Bank Of Australia:
* ANNOUNCED OFFER, AND LODGED PROSPECTUS FOR NEW TIER 1 HYBRID, COMMBANK PERLS X CAPITAL NOTES​
* EXPECTED MARGIN OF BETWEEN 3.40% AND 3.60% ABOVE BANK BILL RATE
* OFFER IS EXPECTED TO RAISE A$750 MILLION, WITH ABILITY TO RAISE MORE OR LESS
* PERLS X ARE EXPECTED TO BE Quote: D ON ASX UNDER TRADING CODE CBAPG
* ‍PERLS X HAVE AN INITIAL FACE VALUE OF A$100​ * NET PROCEEDS OF OFFER WILL BE USED TO FUND GROUP’S BUSINESS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
